thread.title: Tsunami of foam - Storm Doris smashes coast with 90mph gales
thread.title_full: Tsunami of foam - Storm Doris smashes coast with 90mph gales

title: Tsunami of foam - Storm Doris smashes coast with 90mph gales
text:
Tsunami of foam - Storm Doris smashes coast with 90mph gales Tsunami of foam - Storm Doris smashes coast with 90mph gales A COUPLE were swamped in sea foam as they attempted to walk along a promenade in Blackpool as Storm Doris batters the UK. PUBLISHED: 14:00, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:03, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 
The storm brought snow to Scotland as severe weather warnings predicted heavy rain cover which would hit almost all of Britain on Thursday. 
Gales reached 94mph in Capel Curig in the heart of Snowdonia as the UK faced toppled trees and damaged buildings as a result of the strong wind. 
In the footage sea foam can be seen covering Cleveleys Promenade, in Blackpool, after the strong winds whipped up the strange substance. NORTHâ€¢PA The couple can be seen struggling through the strong winds in Blackpool Related articles Storm Doris: Woman 'dead' in Wolverhampton according to reports 
The strong winds can be heard as a couple attempt to walk along the promenade through the thick sea foam. 
The foam gushing in from the Irish Sea can be seen spiralling up into the sky as a result of the gale force wind. 
There is often a large accumulation of foam on beaches during storms, and it is made up of air bubbles separated by a film of liquid. PA A jack-knifed car transporter on the M80 
Amber warnings to be prepared and yellow warnings to be aware were extended to the majority of England, Wales and Northern Ireland on Thursday morning. 
According to PA a person was killed due to a Storm Doris related incident in Wolverhampton city centre. 
Flights have also been cancelled and delayed at major airports across the UK including London City, Birmingham and Heathrow. PA A plane landing in heavy winds at Leeds airport Devastation as Storm Doris leaves ONE dead Thu, February 23, 2017
